name: silicone product production | silicone product | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/6368/documentation

Average of about 2000 products. The inventory has been calculated as a weighted mean of two production facilities which produce both a range of different products. ;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



Gate to gate inventory for the production of average silicon products.
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2013:Manufacture of plastics and synthetic rubber in primary forms

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Production plant in DE. No data for IT, US, IN and other locations.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Integrated chemical processing facilities with 150 different factories, e.g. electric furnace, silane distillation, hydrolysis, storage tanks, etc.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Average data for a range of products
